description.raw:
Work in progress, needs to be updated as things get ported to GitHub.

Most likely, parts of this pull request will be broken off and merged little by little.

* Port to git workflow
    * `contrib_code/tutorial.md `
    * `guided_a/tutorial3.md`
    * `guided_a/tutorial5.md`
* `osrf/gazebo` URLs
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/fork
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issues/N
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/N
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/BRANCH/FILE
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/COMMIT/FILE
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/wiki/FILE
* `osrf/gazebo_models` URLs
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/src/COMMIT/FILE
* `osrf/gazebo_tutorials` (aka **this repo**) URLs
    * #!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/src/BRANCH/FILE
* `collision_map_creator_plugin` URLs
    * See pull request #55
* `osrf/drcsim` URLs
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/src/BRANCH/FILE
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/src/COMMIT/FILE
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/issues
* `osrf/drcsim/wiki` URLs
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/wiki/FILE
* `osrf/sandia-hand` URLs
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sandia-hand/src/BRANCH/FILE
* `osrf/osrf-common`
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/osrf-common
* `osrf/gazebojs`
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebojs
    * https://github.com/osrf/gazebojs/src/BRANCH/FILE
* `osrf/sdformat`
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/issues
* `ignitionrobotics/ign-math`
    * https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math
    * https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/issues
* `ignitionrobotics/ign-transport`
    * https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport
    * https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/issues
* `ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs`
    * https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs
    * https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs/issues
* `osrf/release-tools`
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/src/BRANCH/FILE
* `osrf/gzweb`
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gzweb
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gzweb/issues
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gzweb/pull-requests
* `osrf/haptix-comm`
    * http://bitbucket.org/osrf/haptix-comm/src/BRANCH/FILE
* `osrf/handsim`
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/handsim/src/COMMIT/FILE
    * https://bitbucket.org/osrf/handsim/src/BRANCH/FILE
* `ignitionrobotics/ign-common`
    * https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-common
* `ignitionrobotics/ign-fuel-tools`
    * https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-fuel-tools
* `rosebudflyaway/physics_params_world`
    * https://bitbucket.org/rosebudflyaway/physics_params_world
* `snippets/chapulina`
    * https://bitbucket.org/snippets/chapulina/geRKyA
